argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_isfi | |- ( A e. Fin <-> E. x e. _om A ~~ x ) |
| 2 |  | #P_nnsdomg | |- ( ( _om e. _V /\ x e. _om ) -> x ~< _om ) |
| 3 |  | #P_sdomen1 | |- ( A ~~ x -> ( A ~< _om <-> x ~< _om ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_syl5ibrcom | |- ( ( _om e. _V /\ x e. _om ) -> ( A ~~ x -> A ~< _om ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_rexlimdva | |- ( _om e. _V -> ( E. x e. _om A ~~ x -> A ~< _om ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_syl5bi | |- ( _om e. _V -> ( A e. Fin -> A ~< _om ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_isfinite2 | |- ( A ~< _om -> A e. Fin ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_impbid1 | |- ( _om e. _V -> ( A e. Fin <-> A ~< _om ) ) |
